name: ScissHER
description: The high-fashion, intentional dating space for lesbians. Featuring Virtual Blind Dating and metropolitan event grounding.

permissions.camera: ScissHER uses your camera for the 'Virtual Blind Sesh' video dates and to verify your identity during onboarding.
permissions.microphone: ScissHER uses your microphone to enable real-time voice conversations during scheduled video Sesh sessions.
permissions.geolocation: ScissHER uses your location to connect you with intentional partners in your city and suggest local metropolitan hotspots for dates.
